channel.title: ICRA 2024 on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team
channel.description: Recent content in ICRA 2024 on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team

item.title: ADR Wins Best Paper Award on UAVs at ICRA
item.description: Our paper “Time-Optimal Gate-Traversing Planner for Autonomous Drone Racing” won the prestigious Best Paper Award in ICRA 2024, held in Yokohama, Japan.
